title: Get the details of a mention in a comment from mentions webhook

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. You can get the ID through the open_id field returned by /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the comment or reply that mentions a business in the comment text. Pass the comment_id as obtained from comment_id within the content of the mentions webhook event .

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: The ID of the post on which the comment was published. Pass the post ID as obtained from video_id within the content of the mentions webhook event .

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Requested fields. If fields is not set, only the default fields will be returned. Default value: ["comment_id","comment_text"] . Supported fields : item_id : Unique identifier for the post. video_link : A generic URL for the post. video_likes : Total number of likes on the post. thumbnail_url : The URL of the post thumbnail. commenter_handle_name : The handle name of the user who made the comment. comment_id : Unique identifier for the comment. comment_type : The type of comment. comment_text : The comment text that mentions the business's handle. comment_create_time : The time when the comment was posted. comment_likes : Total number of likes for the comment.
